featured.title: Featured Web Sites
featured.description: Web Sites Featured on the Jan's home page

item.title: CYC
item.description: Community Youth Center is a non-profit organzation that serves asian youth in San Francisco. This website provides news, information and social networking to the staff, youth members and parents.

item.title: SONRISAS DENTAL
item.description: Sonrisas is a dental clinic that serves low income families around Half Moon Bay. SonrisasDental.org provides news, and education to Sonrisas families and volunteers.

item.title: ASHBURY IMAGES
item.companyType: T-shirt, Jacket and Polo Screen Printing
item.description: Ashbury Images does screen printing of t-shirts, jackets and polo shirts. AshburyImages.org provides resources for purchasing. This includes special sales and contact forms.

item.title: WINTER NIGHTS
item.description: Winter Nights provides beds for homeless families in the East Bay. WinterNightsccc.org includes news and information about the opperation of the homeless shelter.

item.title: ONEACCORD
item.description: OneAccord is a sales and marketing company.

item.title: VOICEDYNAMICS
item.description: Voice and speech education by Carolyn Franklin, a teacher at Foothill College in Los Altos. VoiceDynamics.net provides an eCommerce site for book and DVD sales.

item.title: LEARNINGBYTES
item.description: Learningbytes was a website for Digital Media Coursework. The program taught video editting, website development, and graphic design to high school students in the San Jose Area.
